description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Elementasaurs:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Elementasaur}s, they are resistant to debuffs and at the start of battle, they share the debuffs referenced in their traits with each other. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Elementasaur
